synopsis.p: Read files and annotations in LLL format.

description.p: reads files in source in LLL challenge format.

param-doc.name: genicTargetRole
param-doc.p: Role of the argument that represent the genic interaction target.

param-doc.name: genicAgentRole
param-doc.p: Role of the argument that represent the genic interaction target.

param-doc.name: wordLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to store word annotations.

param-doc.name: dependentRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the argument that represent the dependency dependent.

param-doc.name: source
param-doc.p: Path of the file or directory, or URL, containg the files to import.

param-doc.name: dependenciesRelation
param-doc.p: Name of the relation whose tuples represent dependencies.

param-doc.name: genicInteractionRelation
param-doc.p: Name of the relation whose tuples represent genic interactions.

param-doc.name: dependenciesRelationName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for dependenciesRelation.

param-doc.name: genicInteractionRelationName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for genicInteractionRelation.

param-doc.name: headRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the argument that represent the dependency head.

param-doc.name: sectionName
param-doc.p: Name of the unique section created.

param-doc.name: idFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store annotations and tuples identifiers.

param-doc.name: lemmaFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the word lemma.

param-doc.name: dependencyLabelFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the dependency label.

param-doc.name: agentFeature
param-doc.p: Feature that has the value yes for entities that represent an agent.

param-doc.name: targetFeature
param-doc.p: Feature that has the value yes for entities that represent a target.

param-doc.name: idFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for idFeature.

param-doc.name: lemmaFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for lemmaFeature.

param-doc.name: agentFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for agentFeature.

param-doc.name: targetFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for targetFeature.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to store sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: dependencyLabelFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated parameter alias for dependencyLabelFeature.
